description:
Justin Warren

Australia is reshaping data privacy and security aggressively on multiple fronts.How can you manage data security and privacy in your projects while the sands shift around you?

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/data-sharing-in-modern-australia

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Fri Aug  2 11:10:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: Data Sharing in Modern Australia
